items.sentence: Tell your son to quit harassing my daughter.
Tom asked Mary to recite the poem she wrote.
Tom begged Mary to give him one more chance.
Tom can swim faster than anyone else I know.
I should\'ve been able to do that by myself.
I think you\'ll know everybody at the party.
Tom shouldn\'t say such rude things to Mary.
I didn\'t think that Mary was Tom\'s sister.
I don\'t answer the phone when I\'m working.
Tom has his own reasons for learning French.
Tom is better at French than the rest of us.
Tom is planning to meet Mary at the airport.
We\'re not planning to do that anytime soon.
We\'ve been working on this for a long time.
We\'ve never done anything like this before.
What I\'m about to tell you really happened.
It\'s really different from what I expected.
It\'s really hard to choose the right color.
It\'s so simple that even a child can do it.
Water makes up most of the earth\'s surface.
